metadata.title: Azure IoT Developer Specialty
metadata.subtitle: Build the Internet of Things That Changes Industries
metadata.description: The future is connected, and you're going to build it. This course transforms you from someone who writes code into someone who creates intelligent systems that connect the physical and digital worlds. You'll master Azure IoT technologies that power smart cities, autonomous factories, and life-saving medical devices - the skills that separate IoT developers who get hired from those who don't.
prerequisites: Programming experience in at least one language (C#, Python, or JavaScript)
Understanding of cloud concepts and Azure services
A passion for building systems that make the world smarter

highlights: Build IoT systems that power smart cities and autonomous factories
Master edge computing that processes data in milliseconds
Create solutions that save lives through predictive maintenance
Join the elite developers building the connected future

overview.summary: IoT isn't just about connecting devices - it's about creating intelligent systems that transform how industries operate. This course teaches you the Azure IoT skills that separate the developers who build connected solutions from those who just write code. You'll learn to create IoT architectures that scale to millions of devices, process real-time data at the edge, and build systems that predict failures before they happen. By the end, you'll have the technical expertise and architectural vision to lead IoT initiatives that change entire industries.
objectives: Design IoT solution infrastructure that scales globally
Build device management systems that handle millions of connected devices
Create edge computing solutions that process data in real-time
Implement data pipelines that turn sensor data into actionable insights
Develop monitoring and troubleshooting systems for IoT deployments
Architect secure IoT solutions that protect critical infrastructure
overview.targetAudience: This course is for developers ready to become IoT architects. Whether you're a backend developer wanting to add IoT expertise, a systems engineer ready to embrace connected technologies, or someone who wants to build the infrastructure that powers smart cities and autonomous industries - if you want to create systems that make the world more intelligent and efficient, this course will give you the skills and mindset to become the IoT developer that companies compete for.

faq.question: Do I need IoT hardware for this course?
faq.answer: No, this course focuses on Azure IoT services and software development. We'll use simulated devices and Azure IoT Explorer for testing.

faq.question: What programming languages are covered?
faq.answer: The course covers C#, Python, and JavaScript for IoT development, with a focus on Azure SDKs and IoT Edge modules.

faq.question: Is this course hands-on?
faq.answer: Yes, extensive hands-on labs where you'll build complete IoT solutions using Azure IoT Hub, IoT Edge, and Stream Analytics.

faq.question: What Azure services will I learn?
faq.answer: You'll learn Azure IoT Hub, IoT Central, IoT Edge, Stream Analytics, Digital Twins, and related Azure services.
